alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson Davis, southeastern Beauregard, northeastern Calcasieu and southwestern Allen Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Topsy, or near Reeves. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reeves, Topsy, and Buller. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
